name: 1nsane
notes:
The original retail version requires "Patch 2" to work, applied automatically with more info available at https://www.pcgamingwiki.com/wiki/Insane#Patches. Note this patch does not appear to be available via a publishers website any more.
Due to issues running at different resolutions you may consider using the 3rd party patcher from https://kunnollakeittoa.info/asm/#insane 
If you encounter issues with the intro playback, set the game args to 'nomovie' to skip.
content:
files:
- file1:
    filename: insanepatch2.exe
    referer: https://www.gamepressure.com
    url: http://alamo2.gry-online.pl/i/insanepatch2.exe?st=kFh0DkGzxFWjOTT-_F8-oQ&e=1588601259
game:
  exe: drive_c/Codemasters/Insane/Game.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- insert-disc:
    requires: Cmn/codemasters.reg
- task:
    app: winxp
    arch: win32
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    executable: $DISC/Setup.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
wine:
  arch: wine32
